results.deck: One of Sega's in-house development teams that came to prominence in the late 1980's. Previously headed by game designer Yu Suzuki.
results.description:
Overview

Sega-AM2, short for Sega Amusement Machine Research and Development Department 2, is best known for developing many of Sega's arcade games, many of which have become highly successful.

Notable franchises include:

  • After Burner
  • Hang On
  • Out Run
  • Shenmue
  • Virtua Cop
  • Virtua Fighter

During Sega's reshuffling in the early 2000's, it was one of the few internal studios that remained mostly unchanged, keeping their name to this day. Their latest games include 2010's After Burner Climax, a downloadable port of one of their best-known games, Daytona USA, and Virtua Fighter 5 Final Showdown.
results.name: SEGA-AM2
